featured.text: The fire in the fireworks factory in Changhua set off a series of powerful _________ and killed four people.

definition.zh_def: 煙火，一種在特定場合燃放的爆炸性裝置，通常用於慶祝活動，發出光和聲音。
definition.en_def: A firework is an explosive device used for entertainment, typically producing colorful displays of light and sound during celebrations.
definition.example: We watched the fireworks light up the night sky during the Fourth of July celebration.
